alert.note: Alert for Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:23PM CDT until June 14 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...NORTHWESTERN MISSISSIPPI AND SOUTHERN DUNKLIN COUNTIES... At 922 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Senath, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Gosnell, Manila, Leachville, Senath, Cardwell, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Dell, Little River, Jolliff Store, Calumet, Dearman, Lennie, Carmi, Buckeye, Mounds, Arkmo, Bertig and Roseland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
